ComicInfo.Title: Old Enemies Never Die!; Destination Unknown!; The Window; The Grass Is Always Greener
ComicInfo.Summary: General Paul Levitz sentences G.I. Robot and the Creature Commandos to death, but the sentence is commuted, and they are sent into a mission in space. However, the rockets malfunction, and they head towards an unknown destination.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Editor: Julius Schwartz,E. Nelson Bridwell,Paul Levitz,E. Nelson Bridwell,Mike W. Barr
